method.name: GetState
method.tp:docstring: Get the current state of MiniOs.

arg.name: state
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (State, platform2/system_api/dbus/minios/minios.proto) indicating the state of MiniOs.

arg.name: ssid
arg.tp:docstring: The SSID of the wireless network to connect to.

arg.name: passphrase
arg.tp:docstring: The passphrase for the SSID. Pass an empty string if there is no passphrase.

method.name: GetNetworks
method.tp:docstring: Get the list of network SSIDs.

method.name: NextScreen
method.tp:docstring: Advance to the next screen in the flow if possible.

method.name: PrevScreen
method.tp:docstring: Advance to the previous screen in the flow if possible.

method.name: ResetState
method.tp:docstring: Reset MiniOs to the initialized state.

arg.name: ssid
arg.tp:docstring: The SSID of the wireless network to connect to.

arg.name: passphrase
arg.tp:docstring: The passphrase for the SSID. Pass an empty string if there is no passphrase.

method.name: StartRecovery
method.tp:docstring: Start a network based recovery using the given credentials.

arg.name: ssid
arg.tp:docstring: The name of the network to connect to.

arg.name: passphrase
arg.tp:docstring: The passphrase for the network. Pass an empty string if there is no passphrase.

arg.name: state
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (State, platform2/system_api/dbus/minios/minios.proto) indicating the state of MiniOs.
